java/liquibase/parser/LiquibaseSchemaResolver.java

00001 package liquibase.parser;
00002 
00003 import org.xml.sax.EntityResolver;
00004 import org.xml.sax.InputSource;
00005 
00006 import java.io.IOException;
00007 import java.io.InputStream;
00008 
00012 public class LiquibaseSchemaResolver implements EntityResolver {
00013 
00014     private static final String SEARCH_PACKAGE = "liquibase/";
00015 
00016     public InputSource resolveEntity(String publicId, String systemId) throws IOException {
00017         if (systemId != null) {
00018             int iSlash = systemId.lastIndexOf('/');
00019             if (iSlash >= 0) {
00020                 String xsdFile = systemId.substring(iSlash + 1);
00021                 try {
00022                     InputStream resourceAsStream = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(SEARCH_PACKAGE + xsdFile);
00023 
00024                     if (resourceAsStream == null) {
00025                        resourceAsStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(SEARCH_PACKAGE + xsdFile);
00026                     }
00027 
00028                     if (resourceAsStream == null) {
00029                         return null;
00030                     }
00031                     InputSource source = new InputSource(resourceAsStream);
00032                     source.setPublicId(publicId);
00033                     source.setSystemId(systemId);
00034                     return source;
00035                 }
00036                 catch (Exception ex) {
00037                     return null;    // We don't have the schema, try the network
00038                 }
00039             }
00040         }
00041         return null;
00042     }
00043 
00044 }
